title: Scanner Glass Cleaning, HP PSC Printer-Scanners
description:
A short tutorial on removing and cleaning the glass on the HP PSC All-in-One family of Printer-Scanners. HP told me the glass could not be removed from the PSC 2610 but after a little searching I found this on their website. I was actually lead to the page from one of the forums on fixyourownprinter.com. 

This pdf is a slightly modified HP website page to include the 2610. 

Here's a good all-around no streaking glass cleaner. Beats Windex any day of the week. To a quart spray bottle add 1/4 cup white vinegar and 1 tablespoon of household ammonia (not "sudsy") and fill with water. Windex and most commercial glass cleaners will streak and you definitely don't want that on your scanner glass.

HP recommends that you use only distilled water.
